price: Enti εberε a nkonyaayifoͻ no baeε no, Mose ka kyerε wͻn sε: Monto deε mowͻ toͻ (biara).
arabic: فَلَمَّا جَآءَ ٱلسَّحَرَةُ قَالَ لَهُم مُّوسَىٰٓ أَلۡقُواْ مَآ أَنتُم مُّلۡقُونَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: falammā jāa al-saḥaratu qāla lahum mūsā alqū mā antum mul'qūna
